QuestData.Title: Battle for Highmountain
QuestData.Description: Our defenses have grown in strength, yet the Legion continues to press their assault on Thunder Totem. There is but one way to put an end to this madness - we must strike at the heart of their forces together and bring these attacks to an end.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Fel Commander Erixtol in Highmountain.
QuestData.RewardText: Our efforts today have prevailed over the Legion's presence, though let us not be remiss - our journey has only just begun.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Lasan Skyhorn to begin the final assault
